p: The maximum positivity rate was observed between the end of December and January. The clinical characteristics were not significantly different from those of the overall sample or from those of HMPV-negative children. The percentage of children for whom the diagnosis of pneumonia was retained is higher (26.9%) than among children not infected with HMPV (21%). The search for HMPV was performed by multiplex and real-time PCR; the results were consistent in all cases.
